trans-unit.source: Specifies the list of possible actions when the parent <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipType"></xref> is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'elenco delle azioni quando l'elemento padre <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""> </xref> del <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipType"> </xref> viene eliminato.

trans-unit.source: When a parent <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""></xref> is deleted, its associated child ends are deleted as well.
trans-unit.target: Quando un elemento padre <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""> </xref> viene eliminato, estremità figlio associati vengono eliminati anche.

trans-unit.source: Only a parent <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""></xref> can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Solo un elemento padre <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""> </xref> può essere eliminato.

trans-unit.source: A parent <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""></xref> cannot be deleted if it has one or more associated child ends.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento padre <xref uid="langword_csharp_End" name="End" href=""> </xref> non può essere eliminato se dispone di uno o più entità finali figlio associate.
